bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• IBM Cloud:
    • Flavor: Cores = 1, Memory = 1GB, Storage = 25GB SAN
    • Network: Private IP - Computed, Public IP - Computed

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
1. Creates a virtual server with an ssh key provided by the user in a datacenter specified by the user.
  2. Deployment takes approximately 5 minutes to complete.
